korean: 오늘도 야근이다. 이번 주 내내 밤 10시가 넘어서 퇴근했다.
동료들이랑 같이 남아서 그나마 덜 힘들었다.
english: Working late again today. I've been leaving past 10 PM all week.
I was hungry, so I ordered chicken and worked while eating.
At least I wasn't alone—staying with my coworkers made it more bearable.
Once this project is done, I'm definitely taking some time off.
